thread.title: Five-star LB Smith highlights Notre Dame visitor list
thread.title_full: Five-star LB Smith highlights Notre Dame visitor list

title: Five-star LB Smith highlights Notre Dame visitor list
text:
Bio - Staff Writer - Friday, October 2, 2015 7:20 PM | Can Clemson get Smith to re-commit this weekend? 
Clemson University and Death Valley will become the center of the college football universe Saturday night as the Tigers host No. 6 Notre Dame in the ABC primetime game. 
While many will watch from the comfort and dryness of their own homes, the Clemson coaching staff is expecting many of its most highly sought after prospects to be on hand for the top 15 matchup between Clemson and Notre Dame. 
The most surprising may be Bradenton (FL) IMG Academy 5-star linebacker and former Clemson commit Rahshaun Smith Rahshaun Smith
